paper_title.ja: 小学校低学年の保健学習についての研究 －学習プログラム試案と教材の検討－
paper_title.en: A Study on Developing Health Education Curricula and Teaching Material for First and Second Grades in Elementary School

description.ja: The purpose of this study is to examine a potential" health education" curriculum and teaching materials for first and secondgrades in elementary school. There is no subject called" health" in the Japanese curriculum at first and second grades. Whenstudents enter third grade they receive health content in their physical education class, but this is not offered in first and secondgrade. Health education is necessary for Japanese children. Other countries offer and some require health education. Afterresearching the literature, curriculum and teaching materials were developed. Pilot classes were conducted in first and secondgrades in two schools. It was clear health education was well received by the children and is necessary. More study is neededto examine the adequate hours and organization of contents. In this study, the expected results were obtained. However, morestudy should be conducted to determine validity of the curricula.

paper_title.en: Health Teachers' License for Junior & Senior High School and Yogo Teachers

paper_title.ja: 大学生のライフスタイルが健康度およびQOLにおよぼす因果的影響について
paper_title.en: An Exabination of Causal Modality in the Relationship Between Life-style, Debree of Health and QOL for University Students

description.ja: 近年､疾病構造の変化にともない､健康モデルもIllnessモデルから､Wellnessモデル-と変化してきている｡文部科学省においても､それらを受けて､ヘルスプロモーションの理念に基づく健康の保持増進を強調している｡本研究では､ヘルスプロモーションを具現化するモデルとして注目されているPRECEDE-PROCEEDモデルの､第3段階の行動とライフスタイルを基点とし､第1段階のQOLに至る因果的様態に注目し､仮説:｢ライフスタイルのコントロールの程度は結果としての健康度やQOLに逐次的因果的に影響を及ぼす｣について共分散分析構造を用い明らかにした｡その結果､ライフスタイルと健康度､及びQOLの間には有効な因果モデルと因果関係が認められた。
